title: Secret Surveillance by the Government - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/5/17
itunes:title: Secret Surveillance by the Government - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/5/17
description:
George Noory and security expert William Keller discuss the government's abuse of power to spy on the American public, and whether that surveillance under the guise of preventing terrorist attacks is an acceptable tradeoff.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
